card.name: Nebula
card.property: Combat Protocols - Forced Response: After your turn begins, resolve the "Special" ability on each [[technique]] upgrade you control, then discard each [[technique]] upgrade resolved this way.

alternate.name: Nebula
alternate.property: You can control 1 additional upgrade that has the restricted keyword. Armed and Ready - Setup: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a [[weapon]] upgrade, then add that card to your hand.

card.name: Gamora
card.property: Response: After you play Gamora, choose a [[technique]] upgrade you control, then resolve its "Special" ability.

card.name: Nebula's Ship
card.property: Resource: Exhaust Nebula's Ship -> generate a [wild] resource.

card.name: Cutthroat Amibition
card.property: While Nebula is in hero form, her attacks gain piercing and overkill. Special (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Evasive Maneuvering
card.property: While in hero form, Nebula ignores the guard keyword, the patrol keyword, and the crisis icon. Special : Choose to either sun or confuse an enemy.

card.name: Unyielding Persistence
card.property: While in hero form, Nebula gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and gains salwart. Special : Give Nebula a tough status card.

card.name: Weapons Master
card.property: While in hero form, Nebula gains retaliate 1. Special (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Wide Stance
card.property: While Nebula is in hero form, reduce the amount of damage she takes from each attack by 1. Special : Look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Discard 1 and put the others back in any order.

card.name: Combat Ready
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Choose one: Shuffle up to 2 [[technique]] upgrades from your discard pile into your deck. Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a [[technique]] upgrade. Put that upgrade into play, then resolve its "Special" ability.

card.name: Lethal Intent
card.property: Hero Action: Choose up to X [[technique]] upgrades you control. Resolve each of their "Special" abilities (in the order of your choice).

card.name: Eros
card.property: Response: After you play Eros from your hand, confuse a minion for each [mental] resource you used to pay for him.

card.name: Wraith
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup, exhaust Wraith and deal 1 damage to him -> cancel that card's "Boost" effect.

card.name: Venom
card.property: While there is no threat on the main scheme, reduce all consequential damage Venom takes by 1.

card.name: Justice Served
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After you thwart and remove the last threat from a scheme, discard Justice Served -> ready your hero.

card.name: One Way or Another
card.property: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Search the encounter deck for a side scheme. Reveal that side scheme -> draw 3 cards (shuffle the encounter deck).

card.name: Brains over Brawn
card.property: Hero Response (attack): After your hero makes a basic thwart, deal damage to an enemy equal to your hero's THW.

card.name: Daughters of Thanos
card.property: Team-Up (Gamora and Nebula). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Draw 3 cards.

card.name: Energy Spear
card.property: Attach to a [[guardian]] ally. Max 1 per ally. Attached ally gets +2 ATK and gains piercing.

card.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 [[team]] card per player. If each of your characters has the [[guardian]] trait, this card gains: "Response: After you play an upgrade on an ally, draw 1 card."

card.name: Defensive Training
card.property: Max 2 per deck. Uses (2 training counters). Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust this card and remove 1 training counter from this -> choose a Protection (green) event in your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck.

card.name: Honorary Guardian
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Attach to a friendly character. Max 1 per character. Attached character gets +1 hit point and gains the [[guardian]] trait.

card.name: Inferiority Complex
card.property: Give to Nebula player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: -Exhaust your alter-ego -> remove Inferiority Complex from the game. -Choose and discard 2 [[Technique]] upgrades you control. If no upgrade was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Gamora
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When this minion would enter play, discard the Gamora ally from play. [star] Forced Response: After Gamora attacks and damages you, choose and discard an upgrade you control. (Nebula's nemesis minion.)

card.name: Self-Preservation
card.property: Nebula gets -1 THW, -1 ATK, and -1 DEF. Gamora gets +1 ATK and her attacks gain piercing.
"We both did what we had to in order to survive. Why won't you let it go?" - Gamora

card.name: Lethal Weapon
card.property: Attach to Gamora. If you cannot, attach to the villain. Hero Action: Discard an upgrade you control â†’ discard this attachment.
"There's only one 'Most Dangerous Woman in the Galaxy', and that's me!" - Gamora

card.name: Old Rivals
card.property: When Revealed: Gamora attacks you. If no attack was made this way, this card gains surge. (If the Gamora hero or ally is in play, she resolves her ATK against you without exhausting.)
"This was a mistake." - Gamora
